--- Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


> Below a black futuristic tank with crimson highlights hovered out
> into
> view. Quickly it shifted form and looked upward, its form and visage
> disturbingly familiar to those who know their history. The cyclopean
> gaze, the right arm sporting dual mounted cannons, the left arm that
> IS a cannon. Despite the color changes it looked like SHOCKBLAST!! 
> 
> Who ever it is, it stood below them, and began to fire upwards at the
> incoming minion!

Quickly the remaining three minions scatter!

Phobia shoots into the air and rolls to one side flying protectivly
over where Deepstryke fell, her movements swift and sure, but there is
a slight note of panic in them!

Tumult and Decibel on the other hand streak in flying right at the
black and crimson figure, a full spread of missiles launching from each
of them. 

Thier missiles land with stupifying power and the ground cracks as
multiple explosions pit thier force against it.  Yet out of the fire
and smoke the black tank moves seeming only a little worse for wear. A
few dents seem to crack its once perfect shell, but it niether slows no
stops its own awesome assult. 

A rear mounted turret spun and oriented on Decibel as twin searing
beams cut through the air and into her rear stabilizer struts, she
cried out agony!

Meanwhile the main cannon lined up on Tummult and disgorged an energy
blast that seemed to heat the air as it passed! The flier was a little
too nimble for the new commer and was able to evade it, just barely. 

"Who are you?" Phobia's powerful voice spoke dangerously from her
protective postion over Deepstryke. "You attack us at your peril!" She
was worried, her scanners were picking up niether Predicon or Maximal
signatures. She assumed robot mode her cannons ready to fire!

"I AM LEGACY . . . " Came the cold reply from below, " . . . AND YOU DO
NOT POSSESS THE POWER TO DEFEAT ME."

"You are wrong!" Phobia let loose with a powerful wave of energy
blasts, designed destabilize ones fear centers. "FEAR ME!"

The blast hit the newcommer, the one revealed as Legacy near dead
center, and he didn't slow. "FEAR IS IRRELIVENT. YOU ARE AN ABNORMALITY
AND YOU WILL BE TERMINATED!" The cold and relentless voice spoke from
below. 

Cannon blasts from Legacy drove Phobia to look for cover as they came
dangerously close to shering off her shoulders!

OOC: I am not sure what Darkfate or Nightstrike are doing, so I
couldn't post a response to them. 

OOC: Also I am sure if the Maxi's are approaching they should clearly
be able to see the battle. Deepstryke's down, Phobia's protecting him,
Tumult and Decibel is in the thick of fighting a black and red
futuristic hover tank of good size. I will be posting him soon on the
wiki site. 

Preston
(Da'minion & Legacy)
